name: Akting
tagline: THE SOLUTION IS IN THE IDEA
description: AKTING is a company whose mission is to put technology at the service of society by offering a wide range of services tailored to different market sectors. Located in San Sebastián, the team studies and advises the process of searching for new technological solutions that improve the management of public and private companies providing services to citizens.

locations.address: Parque Tecnológico de San Sebastián Mikeletegi 83 – local 108
